    • expandCapacity

      protected void expandCapacity()
      Expands the capacity of this graph by doubling the size of both the vertices array and adjacency matrix. Copies all existing data to the larger arrays while preserving the current graph structure.

    • getIndex

      protected int getIndex(T vertex)
      Returns the index of the specified vertex in the vertices array. Performs a linear search through the array comparing vertices using equals().
      Parameters:
      vertex - the vertex to search for
      Returns:
      the index of the vertex if found, -1 if not found

    • indexIsValid

      protected boolean indexIsValid(int index)
      Returns true if the specified index is valid for this graph. Valid indices range from 0 (inclusive) to numVertices (exclusive).
      Parameters:
      index - the index to validate
      Returns:
      true if the index is within valid bounds, false otherwise

    • getVertices

      public ArrayUnorderedList<T> getVertices()
      Returns an ArrayUnorderedList containing all vertices in this graph. Iterates through the vertices array and copies all elements into the result list.
      Returns:
      an ArrayUnorderedList containing all vertices in this graph
